attributes.action: U.K. Northern Ireland. Security Council REQUEST for Inclusion
attributes.additional_details: I am respectfully requesting an Inclusion with the United Kingdom and Northern Ireland Security Council,  I have extensive experience in being forced to provide dissemination methodologies to covert operatives and since I don't care about discussing anything I was involved in and I am sick and tired of being threatened and tortured to keep quiet and every u.s. government body of law enforcement was involved i believe I have a human and civil right to request this inclusion by a Petition. My personal id is 557351328,06181965,Leonard Ray Smith
